risk.rationale: The evidence indicates significant vulnerabilities in data protection measures, particularly concerning PII and PCI data, leading to a high risk score.

findings.title: Insufficient encryption for sensitive data
findings.recommendation: Implement strong encryption protocols for all sensitive data in transit and at rest.

findings.title: Lack of regular security audits
findings.recommendation: Establish a regular security audit schedule to identify and mitigate vulnerabilities.

recommendations: Enhance encryption standards for data protection.
Conduct regular security audits and assessments.
Provide training for staff on data protection best practices.

reasons: High risk score due to insufficient data protection measures.
